summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4025 for the improvement of the alley in block 39, Capitol Hill Addition, Division No. 6, being the alley between 19th Avenue North and 20th Avenue North, from East Aloha Street to East Prospect Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 48739, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
